overview: The takeaway brother Ye Xiaoguang accidentally smashed the secret of the bank robber gang and was chased. The only sister Chu Chu was also seriously injured and turned into a vegetative person in the explosion. Ye Xiaoguang sorrowfully attempted suicide and was saved by the small armor that fell from the sky. The owner of the small armor is Lin Siqi from the fairyland, and Ye Xiaoguang is the avatar of Lin Siqi in the mortal world.
title: Time out Sniper
